refnamediv.refpurpose: Create an array containing a range of elements

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: range returns an array of elements from low to high, inclusive. If low > high, the sequence will be from high to low.

example.title: range examples

note.para: Prior to version 4.1.0 the range function only generated incrementing integer arrays. Support for character sequences and decrementing arrays was added in 4.1.0.

example.title: Simulating decrementing ranges and character sequences
